a few other individual shelves of books.

description: A rocky path leads over the crest of a small hill.  To the
east, the path becomes a cobblestone road leading toward a
small village nestled near the base of a large, dark, twisted
mountain range.  Not much can be seen of the village from this
distance except for a tall water tower in the middle of town.

{ythe top of Mt. Nibel.  The reactor itself is a tower of stone{x
{yand steel.  Many metal pipes of all sizes snake up from the{x
{yground leading to the reactor, presumably delivering the raw{x
{ymako from within the earth to be turned into cheap power for{x
{ythe area.  The dirt path leads to the south or there is a{x
{ysteel door in the mountainside leading somewhere within.{x

description: The top of the water tower provides an excellent view of the
small village of Nibelheim and even some of the surrounding area.
It is quiet and peaceful up here, lending to a sense of detachment
from whatever may be happening in the world below.

{yup a few stairs, toward the large Shinra Mansion on the edge{x
{yof town.  The village lies to the west and the mansion is{x
{yfurther to the east.{x

are for sale here.  Many saddles hang upon the wall and through

large fenced field behind the shop.

description:
This chocobo is young but looks strong and eager to get out and run.  It
stands about 7' tall at the top of its head and has bright yellow plumage
all over its body.  There is a leather saddle on the large bird's back
making it ready to accommodate any rider.

description:
This chocobo looks very different from the majority of its species.  It
only stands about 5' tall and has relatively short white plumage that
covers its very rotund body.  Far from the long and graceful legs of its
brethren, the legs of this animal are short and stumpy.  Somehow a saddle
has been strapped around this bird's broad body and it looks like it can
be ridden.

This mature green chocobo is strong and tall, standing just over 7'
tall at the top of the head.  Its long legs are lean yet very powerful,
capable of climbing the steepest of slopes with ease.  The body of
this powerful bird is covered in long, sleek green feathers and there
is a comfortable saddle on its back making it ready for riding.

description:
This mature blue chocobo is strong and tall, standing just over 7'
tall at the top of the head.  Its legs are slightly longer than most
chocobos and the toes of its feet are partially webbed, giving it
greater ease of movement through water.  The body of this powerful
bird is covered in long, sleek blue feathers and there is a comfort-
able saddle on its back making it ready for riding.

tall at the top of the head.  It has a thick neck and its beak is

powerful bird is covered in long, sleek red feathers and there is a

description:
This gloriously beautiful creature is a rare gold chocobo.  It
stands proudly at over 7' tall to the top of its head and can
carry loads of several times its own weight.  This large bird
combines the best qualities found in all other chocobo breeds.
It has a strong and powerful body that can tackle any terrain
and is also a brave ally in combat.  The body of this majestic
bird is covered in long, shimmering gold feathers and there is
a comfortable saddle on its back to allow for easy riding.

in everyway, and is the main force of
the empire's control.
